review: It works with  hulu and netflix just fine on my hp laptop and my  kindle fire HDX.  Havn't  been able to get it to work from chrome with the extension add on. Was surprised that it was a used one rather than new. But I don't plan on returning it.
author: jim

review: I wanted to use this on my main TV a Toshiba 40" that is a few years old.  The Chromecast would not recognize the HDMI at all.  When I connected it to a newer TV ( a cheap Haier) it worked fine.For $35 I can't really complain, but it is not quite as simple as Google makes it out to be.
author: JustAnotherTechnoweenie "abused_commuter"

review: Great way to get television streamed to your tv, and I love that there are no wires that need to be plugged in other than what goes to the tv. It is very portable. The only downside is lack of apps. Roku has Chromecast beat on that front.
author: mary clark

review: I only use the Chromecast for Netflicks, and Pandora, buy these apps alone make it worth the money.  Would like to use it to mirror my tablet screen as well, and there are apps for that too.
